COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: Torta and I stood in the wings, waiting for our turn to
come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: We'd practiced as much as possible, and our
performance actually wasn't all that bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: [Cordell] “Okay, it's almost time. Are you ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: [Chris] “Yes!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196
STRING: [Torta] “Yes!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae
STRING: Since that day, Ms. Cordell had watched us practice
countless times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4
STRING: It was literally just yesterday that we somehow
managed to get a passing grade from her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: All that was left was the actual recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee
STRING: We were the first to perform in the afternoon session,
so while the curtains were down, I'd already prepared
the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e
STRING: Holding only the score in my hand, I walked out on
stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: The recital went off without a hitch, even Ms. Cordell
was applauding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dc
STRING: It looked like I'd have no problem graduating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8
STRING: Aiming for “no problem” may have been a problem in
itself, but I had no regrets, no matter what kind of future
came next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308
STRING: Arietta was definitely a part of my future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: What more did I need?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320
STRING: That was the source of my happiness, and come what
may, I wouldn't deal with it alone any more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336
STRING: I'd talk to Arietta, and we'd make a decision.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366
STRING: [Torta] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Are you going home after this, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dc
STRING: Ah, yes. That's the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: [Chris] “I see. I'm thinking of leaving after I hear Asino's
performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x408
STRING: Asino was the last to perform in the afternoon session—
of the whole day, in other words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41e
STRING: I'd thought of going home after hearing him play, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x446
STRING: [Torta] “You might want to reconsider that, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c
STRING: [Chris] “...Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48e
STRING: [Torta] “Didn't you notice?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bc
STRING: ...Of course you couldn't
have noticed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c8
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fa
STRING: [Torta] “Actually...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x510
STRING: Like a child who was covering up some prank, Torta
stuck out her tongue as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x542
STRING: [Torta] “Arie was in the audience.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x558
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x576
STRING: [Torta] “She said in her letter that she was coming, in
secret. I think she arrived around noon, so I haven't met
her yet either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: [Chris] “...You're kidding.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: [Torta] “I saw her while I was on stage. She was
standing right at the back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f2
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't notice. So where is she now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: [Torta] “She's probably back at my place now. I didn't
know what your plans were. If you stay to hear Asino's
performance, you'll probably miss her altogether.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64e
STRING: [Chris] “I see. In that case, if you see Asino, tell him I'm
sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68a
STRING: [Torta] “Sure, sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: But I'm going home too, so that'll
probably have to wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c4
STRING: [Chris] “Right, you said that just now. Anyway, shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: [Torta] “I'd be in the way, so I shouldn't be there, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70c
STRING: [Chris] “Uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73e
STRING: [Torta] “If you're going home directly, I could tell her to
go to your place? Grandma's at home, as you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75e
STRING: [Chris] “That's true. Could you do that for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: [Torta] “Okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7be
STRING: I think her train leaves soon, so I don't
know how long she can stay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d4
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. In that case, tell her I'm waiting in my
room. I'm going to find Asino and tell him what's going
on before I leave. I think I have enough time for
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: [Torta] “...Probably. Well, I'll be off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x830
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. Thank you for everything, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: [Torta] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x868
STRING: Torta waved her hand limply, as if she'd had enough of
me, and went home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87e
STRING: I went back to the Second Hall to look for Asino, who
was bound to be in one of the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: In the practice room, Asino stared at me in disbelief,
whereupon I apologized and went back to my room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e2
STRING: For a moment I thought Arie would be waiting in front
of the door, but I'd arrived early, it seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f8
STRING: Leaving the door unlocked, I went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x904
STRING: I dried my hair with the towel set out by Phorni, which I
replaced with a fresh towel for Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? That was fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: [Chris] “Sorta... Actually, Arie came to today's recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x990
STRING: [Phorni] “What?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a6
STRING: [Chris] “I was surprised too. And she's probably heading
home soon... But before that, she'll stop by here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e2
STRING: [Phorni] “I-I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: [Chris] “The recital... I wonder how it sounded. She'll
probably ask me what I thought of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: [Phorni] “You look happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Chris] “I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: [Phorni] “You know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac4
STRING: [Phorni] “It's better if I'm not here, yeah?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xada
STRING: [Chris] “It's not like you, Phorni, to care about such
things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf0
STRING: I was in such a good mood, I didn't mind either way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb18
STRING: [Phorni] “That's quite alright. I've no need to see the two
of you being lovey-dovey, so I'll disappear for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb38
STRING: [Chris] “Well... That works too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4e
STRING: Phorni was stunned by my irrepressible positivity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, disappearing now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Hold on a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: [Phorni] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: [Chris] “We still have some time left, but... Phorni, when
I leave this place, why don't you come with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc06
STRING: [Phorni] “Why are you asking, all of a sudden?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1c
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, no reason, I just thought of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4e
STRING: [Phorni] “...I'll pass. I'll wait here for the next person to
move in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: [Chris] “...Is that okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8c
STRING: [Phorni] “It is if I say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd4
STRING: [Phorni] “Anyway, I'm disappearing. Listen carefully to
what Arie says, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf4
STRING: [Chris] “Uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: [Phorni] “Listen carefully to Torta as well, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6e
STRING: [Phorni] “I guess this is goodbye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb6
STRING: [Phorni] “See you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdcc
STRING: [Chris] “Hey!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: At almost the same time, there was a knock on the
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Chris] “It's open!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe28
STRING: I turned around and saw Arietta enter through the open
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe62
STRING: [Arie] “That was careless of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: [Chris] “I knew you were coming, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Arie] “Ha-ha, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed4
STRING: I stared for a few moments at where Phorni had
disappeared, then I turned to face Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeea
STRING: I had been quite serious when I asked her to come with
me, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf00
STRING: Phorni didn't take the question seriously, and had
disappeared just like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf16
STRING: But if that's what she wanted, perhaps there was
nothing to be done about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2c
STRING: In any case, I was only thinking of Arietta now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: In my mind, I expressed my gratitude to Phorni, then I
spoke to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf74
STRING: [Chris] “Your visit today was sudden, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf92
STRING: [Arie] “If I'd mentioned it in the letter, I was sure you
would've stopped me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa8
STRING: [Chris] “That's true, I probably would have.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: [Arie] “Right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: That's why I came to see you, as
a surprise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1014
STRING: [Chris] “...Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1046
STRING: [Arie] “My pleasure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: ...But I'll have to leave soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1098
STRING: You'll
walk with me to the station, won't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Are you leaving already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10cc
STRING: [Arie] “Yes. Or perhaps you could come back home with
me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e2
STRING: [Chris] “That's... not a bad idea, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1114
STRING: [Arie] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: [Chris] “The rest of the week will be nothing but recitals,
the graduation ceremony comes after that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1166
STRING: [Arie] “In that case, all you need are clothes for two or
three days,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: and you can come with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11aa
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? ...You don't seem that surprised. I thought
this was quite a momentous decision, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Arie] “It's because I knew you'd agree, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1214
STRING: Anyway,
there were two options, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122a
STRING: [Chris] “...That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: [Arie] “Come on, pack your things and let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay. Somehow, I feel as if I'm marching
to your beat, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129a
STRING: [Arie] “That's fine, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b0
STRING: [Chris] “Of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e2
STRING: [Arie] “Aha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f8
STRING: We laughed, and after the quickest packing I'd ever
done, we headed to the station.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1342
STRING: Arie hadn't bought her ticket yet, so I bought two and
passed one to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137c
STRING: [Arie] “Are you sure about this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1392
STRING: [Chris] “I've done nothing but practice this whole month,
I haven't had any time to relax. Besides, you're always
coming to see me... I should return the favor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d8
STRING: [Arie] “Oh... Well alright then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ee
STRING: Arie was holding her bag, but it looked very light,
probably because it was near-empty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1404
STRING: I'd only packed the most basic clothes, so my bag
wasn't that heavy, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141a
STRING: [Chris] “Did you plan to go back right after coming here
today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1438
STRING: [Arie] “Yes. I'd also planned to bring you along,
incidentally.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: [Chris] “So I'm just incidental? You're so mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: [Arie] “Just kidding. That was my real goal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a0
STRING: We'd picked the very next train out, so there wasn't
much time left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b6
STRING: [Chris] “Well then, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14cc
STRING: As I walked toward the platform, Arie stopped for some
reason and spoke to me with a serious look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fe
STRING: [Arie] “Chris? Can I ask you one thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1514
STRING: [Chris] “What's up? You sound so formal...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: [Arie] “Do you love me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155c
STRING: Arie was ignoring my words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1568
STRING: My answer was obvious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1574
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158a
STRING: I answered right away, and then I added a few words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1596
STRING: [Chris] “I love you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c8
STRING: [Arie] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15de
STRING: Arie put her hand around my neck, and we embraced
each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: There and then, we didn't care if people looked at us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1608
STRING: [Arie] “Chris... Kiss me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: As she wished, I placed my lips on hers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1654
STRING: But... It ended up as an awkward kiss, like the very first
one we shared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166a
STRING: It wasn't just me, Arie had the same experience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1678
STRING: I realized that we hadn't kissed for three years, not even
when we met during Natale. Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168e
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169a
STRING: Pulling away, Arie spoke again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d2
STRING: [Arie] “Let's talk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e8
STRING: [Chris] “Even though we've been talking through our
letters?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1706
STRING: [Arie] “There are things you can't convey in a letter,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171c
STRING: [Chris] “Such as?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173a
STRING: [Arie] “I met the real Chris... In the town where he lives.
But you haven't been back once, have you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1762
STRING: [Arie] “The town where I live... The real me. Do you
want to see the real me, as I am now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1782
STRING: Arie's whole face lit up, with a brilliant smile such as I'd
never seen before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b4
STRING: [Arie] “Let's go, and talk some more. About things our
letters couldn't convey and... about things to come.”
